articles.description:
GameFi 向下一代的演进：完全链上游戏（FOCG）
1/ 简单来说，FOCG是一个完全建立在区块链技术之上的游戏概念。它专注于创建一个自治世界，促进与玩家的密切联系。这一进步旨在缓解前几个游戏叙事中普遍存在的“为了钱而玩”的挑战。

RT Martin Pelletier

Full episode is on my YouTube channel.

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Talking to a VC friend it sounds like VC market still super risk off. It does feel very far from go go days of 2021

Corry Wang: It’s kind of incredible that despite everything that happened this year, the total amount of venture capital dollars going into AI startups in 2023 was still lower than in the bubble year of 2021
Reluctantly, I am forced to report, “we are still so early”
articles.title: Talking to a VC friend it sounds like VC market still super risk off. It does feel very far from go go days of 2021

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
RT 👑Crypto Caesar👑™️
The first US gold ETF was launched on 18th November 2004. Whilst investors saw a short rally of 2.8%, gold then sold off 10% and took 198 days to recover. 
I think it’s important to add context to a set of circumstances when trading and investing. 
Such an event with #Bitcoin… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1740799535129976938
